title: Souryo to Majiwaru Shikiyoku no Yoru ni...
original_name: 僧侶と交わる色欲の夜に…
sinopse:
The manga is about the reunion of Kujou with his old female classmate. He has inherited his parents' temple and became a priest. However, after the two became drunk, he does something unexpected of him to her!

(Source: MAL news)
